titleStmt.title: The true light discovered to all who desire to walk in the day in several little treatises / written by that faithful member of the true church of Christ Jesus (deceased) Stephen Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Stephen, 1623-1678.

notesStmt.note: "A testimony for the truth" (p. 1-34), "A faithful testimony concerning the Scriptures" (p. [181]-251), "The life of Christ which is the light of men exalted" (p. [293]-339) have special t.p.s, the first two dated 1679, the third dated 1678.
